skill.description:
"Strike the enemies in front, dealing {0} Electro DMG. Summon Mech Waste to attack enemies. Mech Waste deals {1} Electro DMG on-hit and explode after a while to deal {2} Electro DMG.

After casting this Echo Skill, increase current character's ATK by {3} for {4}s. 
Damage dealt by Mech Waste is considered Outro Skill DMG. 

CD: {5}s
